mapper.update: UPDATE narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsgv2 SET nsdv2.manage_status = '1' WHERE nsdv2.smart_device_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID and nsdv2.threeID=#{uuid}
mapper.select: SELECT nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID gatewayId, nsdv2.`name` gatewayCode, va.name houseAddress, nsdv2.connection_status connectionState, CONCAT( ( SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_lock nsl, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2l WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2l.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2l.connection_status = '1' AND nsdv2l.manage_status='0' ), '/', ( SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_lock nsl, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 ntsdl, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 ntsdg WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID AND ntsdl.smart_device_ID=nsl.smart_lock_ID AND ntsdg.smart_device_ID=nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID AND ntsdl.manage_status='0' AND ntsdg.manage_status='0' ) ) bindOnlineDeviceCountPercentage FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsgv2, narcissus_test.public_zone npz, `volga_test`.apartment va WHERE nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND va.id = npz.parent_ID AND npz.data_type = '1' and nsdv2.manage_status='0' AND va.id = #{homeId}

SELECT nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID gatewayId, nsdv2.`name` gatewayCode, ch.area houseAddress, nsdv2.connection_status connectionState, CONCAT( ( SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_lock nsl, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2l WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2l.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2l.connection_status = '1' AND nsdv2l.manage_status='0' ), '/', ( SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_lock nsl, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 ntsdl, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 ntsdg WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID AND ntsdl.smart_device_ID=nsl.smart_lock_ID AND ntsdg.smart_device_ID=nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID AND ntsdl.manage_status='0' AND ntsdg.manage_status='0' ) ) bindOnlineDeviceCountPercentage FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsgv2, narcissus_test.public_zone npz, caspain_test.house ch WHERE nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND ch.id = npz.parent_ID AND npz.data_type = '3' and nsdv2.manage_status='0' AND ch.id = #{homeId}

( SELECT nsg.smart_gateway_id gatewayId, nsg.sn gatewayCode, nsg.model_name gatewayName, va.`name` houseName, va.address houseAddress FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsg, `volga_test`.apartment va, narcissus_test.public_zone npz WHERE nsg.smart_gateway_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND npz.parent_ID = va.id and npz.data_type=1 AND nsg.smart_gateway_ID = #{gatewayId} ) UNION ( SELECT nsg.smart_gateway_id gatewayId, nsg.sn gatewayCode, nsg.model_name gatewayName, ch.area houseName, ch.address houseAddress FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsg, caspain_test.house ch, narcissus_test.public_zone npz WHERE nsg.smart_gateway_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND npz.parent_ID = ch.id and npz.data_type=3 AND nsg.smart_gateway_ID = #{gatewayId} )

( SELECT ntsl.smart_lock_ID smartLockId, vr.`name` roomNo, ntsl.sn lockName, ntsl.power powerRate, nsdv2.connection_status communicationStatus FROM narcissus_test.smart_lock ntsl, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, `volga_test`.room vr WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = ntsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2.room_ID = vr.id AND nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = #{gatewayId} AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2.house_catalog=0 ) UNION ( SELECT ntsl.smart_lock_ID smartLockId, cr.`name` roomNo, ntsl.sn lockName, ntsl.power powerRate, nsdv2.connection_status communicationStatus FROM narcissus_test.smart_lock ntsl, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, caspain_test.room cr WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = ntsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2.room_ID = cr.id AND nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = #{gatewayId} AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' )union( SELECT ntsl.smart_lock_ID smartLockId, '公共区域' roomNo, ntsl.sn lockName, ntsl.power powerRate, nsdv2.connection_status communicationStatus FROM narcissus_test.smart_lock ntsl, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 nsgbv2, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.public_zone npz WHERE nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = ntsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND nsgbv2.smart_device_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' AND nsgbv2.smart_gateway_ID = #{gatewayId} )

SELECT nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID gatewayId, nsdv2.`name` gatewayCode, nsgv2.install_time bindTime, nsdv2.connection_status connectionStatus, nsdv2.connection_status_update_time updateTime, nsdv2.provider_code provider, nsgv2.versions versionJson FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsgv2 WHERE nsdv2.smart_device_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2.smart_device_ID = #{gatewayId} AND nsdv2.manage_status='0'

SELECT ch.id AS homeId, ch.area AS homeName FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2g, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsgv2, narcissus_test.public_zone npz, caspain_test.house ch, caspain_test.auth_user cau WHERE nsdv2g.smart_device_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2g.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND npz.parent_ID = ch.id AND ch.created_by_id = cau.id AND cau.id = #{userId} AND nsdv2g.manage_status = '0';

SELECT ch.id AS homeId, ch.address AS homeName FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2g, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsgv2, narcissus_test.public_zone npz, caspain_test.house ch, caspain_test.auth_user cau WHERE nsdv2g.smart_device_ID = nsgv2.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2g.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND npz.parent_ID = ch.id AND ch.created_by_id = cau.id AND npz.parent_ID=#{houseId} AND nsdv2g.manage_status = '0';

( SELECT nsdv2.smart_device_ID smartLockId, '公共区域' roomNo, nsdv2.connection_status communicationStatus, nsl.power powerRate, nsl.sn lockName FROM narcissus_test.public_zone npz, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_lock nsl WHERE nsdv2.smart_device_ID = nsl.smart_lock_ID AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND npz.parent_ID = #{homeId} AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' ) UNION ( SELECT nsdv2.smart_device_ID smartLockId, cr.`name` roomNo, nsdv2.connection_status communicationStatus, nsl.power powerRate, nsl.sn lockName FROM caspain_test.room cr, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_lock nsl WHERE nsdv2.room_ID = cr.id AND nsl.smart_lock_ID = nsdv2.smart_device_ID AND cr.house_id = #{homeId} AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' )

SELECT va.id homeId, va.`name` homeName, nslOutSmartLock.smart_lock_ID outSmartLockId, nsdv2OutSmartLock.connection_status outCommunicationStatus, nslOutSmartLock.power outPowerRate, nsdv2.smart_device_ID gatewayId, vf.id floorId, vf.`name` floorName, nsdv2Indoor.smart_device_ID smartLockId, vr.`name` roomNo, nsdv2Indoor.connection_status communicationStatus, nslIndoor.power powerRate, nslIndoor.sn lockName, nslOutSmartLock.sn outLockName FROM `volga-pro`.apartment va, caspain_pro.auth_user cau, narcissus.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus.smart_gateway_v2 nsg, narcissus.public_zone npz, narcissus.smart_device_v2 nsdv2OutSmartLock, narcissus.smart_lock nslOutSmartLock, `volga-pro`.floor vf, `volga-pro`.room vr, narcissus.smart_lock nslIndoor, narcissus.smart_device_v2 nsdv2Indoor WHERE va.created_by = cau.id AND cau.id = #{userId} AND nsdv2.smart_device_ID = nsg.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND npz.parent_ID = va.id AND nsdv2OutSmartLock.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND nslOutSmartLock.smart_lock_ID = nsdv2OutSmartLock.smart_device_ID AND nslIndoor.smart_lock_ID = nsdv2Indoor.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2Indoor.room_ID = vr.id AND vr.floor_id = vf.id AND vf.apartment_id = va.id AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2OutSmartLock.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2Indoor.manage_status = '0'

SELECT a.id homeId, a.`name` homeName, nsdv.connection_status outCommunicationStatus, sdv.connection_status , sl.power powerRate, 0 outSmartLockId, sdv.smart_device_ID gatewayId, nsdv.smart_device_ID smartLockId, f.id floorId, f.`name` floorName, r.`name` roomNo, sl.sn lockName FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 sdv LEFT JOIN narcissus.public_zone pz ON pz.public_zone_ID = sdv.public_zone_ID LEFT JOIN `volga-pro`.apartment a ON a.id = pz.parent_ID LEFT JOIN caspain_pro.auth_user au ON au.id = sdv.created_by LEFT JOIN narcissus.smart_gateway_bind_v2 sgb ON sgb.smart_gateway_ID = sdv.smart_device_ID LEFT JOIN narcissus.smart_device_v2 nsdv ON nsdv.smart_device_ID = sgb.smart_device_ID LEFT JOIN narcissus.smart_lock sl ON sl.smart_lock_ID = nsdv.smart_device_ID LEFT JOIN `volga-pro`.room r ON r.id=nsdv.room_ID LEFT JOIN `volga-pro`.floor f ON f.id=r.floor_id WHERE sdv.created_by = #{userId} AND sdv.manage_status = 0 AND sdv.smart_device_type = 4 AND nsdv.manage_status = 0

SELECT va.id homeId, va.`name` homeName, nslOutSmartLock.smart_lock_ID outSmartLockId, nsdv2OutSmartLock.connection_status outCommunicationStatus, nslOutSmartLock.power outPowerRate, nsdv2.smart_device_ID gatewayId, vf.id floorId, vf.`name` floorName, nsdv2Indoor.smart_device_ID smartLockId, vr.`name` roomNo, nsdv2Indoor.connection_status communicationStatus, nslIndoor.power powerRate, nslIndoor.sn lockName, nslOutSmartLock.sn outLockName FROM `volga_test`.apartment va, caspain_test.auth_user cau, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 nsg, narcissus_test.public_zone npz, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2OutSmartLock, narcissus_test.smart_lock nslOutSmartLock, `volga_test`.floor vf, `volga_test`.room vr, narcissus_test.smart_lock nslIndoor, narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 nsdv2Indoor WHERE va.created_by = cau.id AND npz.parent_ID=#{apartment} AND nsdv2.smart_device_ID = nsg.smart_gateway_ID AND nsdv2.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND npz.parent_ID = va.id AND nsdv2OutSmartLock.public_zone_ID = npz.public_zone_ID AND nslOutSmartLock.smart_lock_ID = nsdv2OutSmartLock.smart_device_ID AND nslIndoor.smart_lock_ID = nsdv2Indoor.smart_device_ID AND nsdv2Indoor.room_ID = vr.id AND vr.floor_id = vf.id AND vf.apartment_id = va.id AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2OutSmartLock.manage_status = '0' AND nsdv2Indoor.manage_status = '0'

SELECT count(a.deviceCountID) FROM ( ( SELECT deviceCount.smart_device_ID deviceCountID FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 deviceCount, narcissus.smart_lock lockCount, `volga-pro`.room roomCount, `volga-pro`.floor floorCount WHERE deviceCount.smart_device_ID = lockCount.smart_lock_ID AND deviceCount.room_ID = roomCount.id AND roomCount.floor_id = floorCount.id AND floorCount.apartment_id = #{homeId} AND deviceCount.manage_status = '0' ) UNION ( SELECT deviceCount.smart_device_ID deviceCountID FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 deviceCount, narcissus.smart_lock lockCount, narcissus.public_zone zoneCount WHERE deviceCount.smart_device_ID = lockCount.smart_lock_ID AND deviceCount.public_zone_ID = zoneCount.public_zone_ID AND zoneCount.parent_ID = #{homeId} AND deviceCount.manage_status = '0' ) ) a

SELECT count(a.deviceCountID) FROM ( ( SELECT deviceCount.smart_device_ID deviceCountID FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 deviceCount, narcissus.smart_lock lockCount, `volga-pro`.room roomCount, `volga-pro`.floor floorCount WHERE deviceCount.smart_device_ID = lockCount.smart_lock_ID AND deviceCount.room_ID = roomCount.id AND roomCount.floor_id = floorCount.id AND floorCount.apartment_id = #{homeId} AND deviceCount.manage_status = '0' AND deviceCount.connection_status = '1' ) UNION ( SELECT deviceCount.smart_device_ID deviceCountID FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 deviceCount, narcissus.smart_lock lockCount, narcissus.public_zone zoneCount WHERE deviceCount.smart_device_ID = lockCount.smart_lock_ID AND deviceCount.public_zone_ID = zoneCount.public_zone_ID AND zoneCount.parent_ID = #{homeId} AND deviceCount.manage_status = '0' AND deviceCount.connection_status = '1' ) ) a

SELECT count(a.deviceCountID) FROM ( ( SELECT deviceCount.smart_device_ID deviceCountID FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 deviceCount, narcissus_test.smart_lock lockCount, `volga_test`.room roomCount, `volga_test`.floor floorCount WHERE deviceCount.smart_device_ID = lockCount.smart_lock_ID AND deviceCount.room_ID = roomCount.id AND roomCount.floor_id = floorCount.id AND floorCount.apartment_id = #{homeId} AND deviceCount.manage_status = '0' AND deviceCount.connection_status = '1' ) UNION ( SELECT deviceCount.smart_device_ID deviceCountID FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 deviceCount, narcissus_test.smart_lock lockCount, narcissus_test.public_zone zoneCount WHERE deviceCount.smart_device_ID = lockCount.smart_lock_ID AND deviceCount.public_zone_ID = zoneCount.public_zone_ID AND zoneCount.parent_ID = #{homeId} AND deviceCount.manage_status = '0' AND deviceCount.connection_status = '2' ) ) a

SELECT count(a.deviceCountID) FROM ( ( SELECT deviceCount.smart_device_ID deviceCountID FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 deviceCount, narcissus.smart_lock lockCount, `volga-pro`.room roomCount, `volga-pro`.floor floorCount WHERE deviceCount.smart_device_ID = lockCount.smart_lock_ID AND deviceCount.room_ID = roomCount.id AND roomCount.floor_id = floorCount.id AND floorCount.apartment_id =#{homeId} AND deviceCount.manage_status = '0' AND deviceCount.connection_status = '1' AND lockCount.power+0 < 10 ) UNION ( SELECT deviceCount.smart_device_ID deviceCountID FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 deviceCount, narcissus.smart_lock lockCount, narcissus.public_zone zoneCount WHERE deviceCount.smart_device_ID = lockCount.smart_lock_ID AND deviceCount.public_zone_ID = zoneCount.public_zone_ID AND zoneCount.parent_ID = #{homeId} AND lockCount.power+0 < 10 AND deviceCount.connection_status = '1' AND deviceCount.manage_status = '0' ) ) a

SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus.smart_lock nsl, `volga-pro`.room vr where nsdv2.smart_device_ID=nsl.smart_lock_ID and nsdv2.room_ID=vr.id and vr.floor_id=#{floorId} AND nsdv2.manage_status = '0'

SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus.smart_lock nsl, `volga-pro`.room vr where nsdv2.smart_device_ID=nsl.smart_lock_ID and nsdv2.room_ID=vr.id and vr.floor_id=#{floorId} and nsdv2.connection_status='1' and nsdv2.manage_status='0'

SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus.public_zone npz, narcissus.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus.smart_lock nsl where nsl.smart_lock_ID=nsdv2.smart_device_ID and nsdv2.public_zone_ID=npz.public_zone_ID and npz.parent_ID=#{homeId} and nsdv2.manage_status='0'

SELECT count(*) FROM narcissus.public_zone npz, narcissus.smart_device_v2 nsdv2, narcissus.smart_lock nsl where nsl.smart_lock_ID=nsdv2.smart_device_ID and nsdv2.public_zone_ID=npz.public_zone_ID and npz.parent_ID=#{homeId} and nsdv2.manage_status='0' and nsdv2.connection_status='1'
SELECT id FROM caspain_test.employer e WHERE e.is_delete=0 and e.user_id=#{userId};
SELECT house_id from caspain_test.employer_houses eh WHERE eh.employer_id=#{employerId};
SELECT employer_id FROM `volga-pro`.employer_apatments ea WHERE ea.user_id=#{userId};
SELECT apartment_id FROM `volga_test`.employer_apatments_apartments eaa WHERE eaa.employerapatments_id=#{employerapatmentsid};
